x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: This fix script is to revert back to legacy item views and Media sections from new Mobile cards and Record Sections shipped as part of Utah next experience. This script is only for the customers who have upgraded to Utah and want to go back to old mobile views.
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Mobile Revert Next Exp - Now Mobile
